      • onCreate

      • setDrawUnderStatusbar

        protected void setDrawUnderStatusbar()
        是否允许在状态栏下绘制

      • setStatusbarColor

        public void setStatusbarColor(int color)
        设置状态栏颜色 This will set the color of the view with the id "status_bar" on KitKat and Lollipop. On Lollipop if no such view is found it will set the statusbar color using the native method.
        参数:
        color - the new statusbar color (will be shifted down on Lollipop and above)

      • setStatusbarColorAuto

        public void setStatusbarColorAuto()
        设置自动状态栏颜色 (使用自定义颜色)

      • setTaskDescriptionColor

        public void setTaskDescriptionColor(int color)
        卡片后台颜色
        参数:
        color - 颜色

      • setTaskDescriptionColorAuto

        public void setTaskDescriptionColorAuto()
        自动卡片后台颜色

      • setNavigationbarColor

        public void setNavigationbarColor(int color)
        设置导航栏颜色
        参数:
        color - 颜色

      • setNavigationbarColorAuto

        public void setNavigationbarColorAuto()
        设置自动导航栏颜色

      • setLightStatusbar

        public void setLightStatusbar(boolean enabled)

        参数:
        bgColor - 状态栏背景颜色
